name: @jcmellado/markdown-template
description: Markdown template for the AsyncAPI Generator
author: Juan Mellado <jcmellado@gmail.com>

output.description: File name for the output file.

sections.description: Comma-separated list of sections to be included in the Markdown document.

sections.servers.description: Comma-separated list of subsections to be included in the servers section.

sections.channels.description: Comma-separated list of subsections to be included in the channels section.

sections.messages.description: Comma-separated list of subsections to be included in the messages section.

toc.headingLevel.description: Number of heading levels to show in the table of contents.

slate.enabled.description: Enables the output of the Slate header in the Markdown document.

slate.theme.description: Name of the syntax-highlighter theme to use.

slate.searchEnabled.description: Enables the search option in the table of contents.

slate.headingLevel.description: Number of heading levels to show in the table of contents.

slate.languages.description: Comma-separated list of languages to add as tabs.

slate.includes.description: Comma-separated list of files to include at the bottom of the content.

slate.footers.description: Comma-separated list of texts to add at the bottom of the table of contents.
